text: Razvily () is a rural locality (a village) in Toykinskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 119 as of 2010.ВПН-2010. Численность и размещение населения Пермского края There are 4 streets. == Geography == It is located 6 km east from Toykino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Razvily
